repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: U.S. Emergency Board No. 120 Records
did.abstract: Transcript of proceedings and exhibits of the Emergency Board No. 120, 1958. Wages, benefits and crew size case. Eastern Air Lines Inc., vs. Flight Engineers International Association, EAL Chapter, 1952-1958.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: On January 21, 1958, the president appointed an Emergency Board to hear the dispute between Eastern Air Lines and its Flight Engineers. The Board consisted of David L. Cole, chairman, Saul Wallen and Dudley E. Whiting. The same people wereappointed to hear the dispute between Eastern Air Lines and the Pilots (Emergency Board #121) since one of the main issues in dispute in both cases was about whether the flight engineer should come from the engineers or the pilots.

The Flight Engineers wanted a specific guarantee that Eastern Air Lines would use only Flight Engineers on its larger aircraft, which required a third man who was responsible for the mechanical functions of the operation of the aircraft. Inaddition the Engineers wanted Improved pensions, wages, vacation time, traveling expenses and some others.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Emergency Board No. 120 Records #5047. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5006: U.S. Emergency Board No. 174 Records 5007: U.S. Emergency Board No. 175 Transcripts and Exhibits 5012: Saul Wallen Papers 5027: U.S. Emergency Board No. 178 Transcripts 5030: U.S. Emergency Board No. 179 Exhibits and Related Material 5036: U.S. Emergency Boards under the Railway Labor Act Reports 5037: U.S. Emergency Board No. 81 Records 5038: U.S. Emergency Board No. 94 Records 5039: U.S. Emergency Board No. 98 Records 5040: U.S. Emergency Board No. 106 Records 5042: U.S. Emergency Board No. 111 Records 5043: U.S. Emergency Board No. 114 Records 5044: U.S. Emergency Board No. 116 Reports and Exhibits 5045: U.S. Emergency Board No. 118 Records 5046: U.S. Emergency Board No. 119 Records 5048: U.S. Emergency Board No. 121 Records 5050: U.S. Emergency Board No. 124 Records 5051: U.S. Emergency Board No. 125 Records 5052: U.S. Emergency Board No. 129 Records 5053: U.S. Emergency Board No. 130 Records 5054: U.S. Emergency Board No. 133 Exhibits 5055: U.S. Emergency Board No. 134 Records 5056: U.S. Emergency Board No. 135 Records 5057: U.S. Emergency Board No. 137 Transcript of Proceedings and Exhibits 5058: U.S. Emergency Board No. 138 Records 5059: U.S. Emergency Board No. 142 Records 5060: U.S. Emergency Board No. 145 Records 5061: U.S. Emergency Board No. 146 Records 5062: U.S. Emergency Board No. 154 Records 5064: U.S. Emergency Board No. 169 Transcript of Proceedings and Exhibits 5075: U.S. Emergency Board under the Taft Hartley Act Records 5579: National Mediation Board Emergency Board 180, Train Crew Consists 5934: Arthur Stark Papers on the President's Emergency Board #219

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This also contains the Civil Air Regulations provisions for qualifications and the third crew member for jet aircraft.
